attractionDescription: Decorated with Western motifs, including horseshoes, cowboy hats, and saddle details. The coaster cars resemble broncos with dynamic horse-like front pieces.
Decorated with Western motifs, including horseshoes, cowboy hats, and saddle details. The coaster cars resemble broncos with dynamic horse-like front pieces.
The waterway is lined with artificial rocky outcrops, and small gold mining towns, and the rafts are designed like wooden barrels.
Offers panoramic views of the park and beyond, with gondolas themed like covered wagons.
A classic carousel adorned with a range of desert animals like mustangs, bighorn sheep, and coyotes instead of traditional horses.
A high-speed rollercoaster that twists and turns, mimicking the loops of a thrown lasso, complete with cowboy yee-haw sound effects.
Live-action stunt show featuring bank heists, horseback chases, and dramatic showdowns, performed in an open-air theater styled like an old Western town.
Mini-golf course with holes featuring obstacles like cacti, wagon wheels, and small sand dunes, perfect for families.
Walk-through attraction with eerie ghostly encounters in the setting of an abandoned mining town, complete with special effects and live actors.
